home.title: Welcome to
home.mainDescription1: Welcome to ZEPYUR Residential Area, a pioneering development that fuses contemporary living with natural serenity. Located within a distance of 21km from Yerevan, in the picturesque region of Kotayq - Nor Geghi village of Nor Hachn community - This meticulously planned project spans an expansive area of 10 hectares, offering a blend of comfort and style.
home.mainDescription2: This expansive project is planned in two phases and will provide a diverse array of residential options. Phase One sets the groundwork with 59 houses, establishing a benchmark of architectual excellence and environmental harmony. Phase Two will complete the vision, covering the remaining residential units and the amentities the area offers, each designed for uniqueness and personalization.

book.desc: A comfortable medium-sized house designed for modern living. With three bedrooms, a spacious living room, and a flexible kitchen area, this home meets the needs of a contemporary family.
book.thanksDesc: Thank you for your interest! Please fill out and submit the form below to complete your reservation.
book.bookFooter: in case of further assistnace/guidance needed, please contact us
book.successInfo: Our sales team will be in touch with you shortly. Please present yourself within the next three working days and provide all necessary documents to complete the reservation process.

mainGrid.blockdesc1: Discover single-level living with our range of houses, featuring a private backyard and 2 parking spots.
mainGrid.blockdesc2: Choose from small (2 bedrooms), medium (3 bedrooms), or large(4 bedrooms) layouts, designed for style and functionality.
mainGrid.blockdesc3: Experience elegant living in our two-story townhouses, uniformly designed for sophistication & space.
mainGrid.blockdesc4: Each townhouse offers multi-level living, blending modern aesthetics with practical design, perfect for contemporary lifestyles.
mainGrid.blockdesc5: Our apartments come in three sizes: small (1 bedroom), medium (2 bedrooms), and large (3 bedrooms).
mainGrid.blockdesc6: Designed with a kitchen, living room, and up to two bathrooms, offering a stylish, compact living solution in a vibrant community.

communitySlider.01Desc: Conveniently located, our Marketplace provides fresh produce, daily essentials, and household goods. Designed for comfort and ease, it ensures your shopping experience is efficient and enjoyable, right at your doorstep.
communitySlider.02Desc: Enjoy diverse dining experiences at our Dining Plaza. Featuring local favorites and international cuisines, it’s the ideal gathering spot for casual meals, special occasions, or quick bites in a modern, inviting atmosphere.
communitySlider.03Desc: Our Wellness Complex promotes a healthy lifestyle with exceptional facilities, including an indoor swimming pool, state-of-the-art gym, and relaxing steam room. It’s your personal sanctuary for fitness and relaxation, year-round.
communitySlider.04Desc: Designed for active residents, the Sports Arena offers outdoor courts for football, basketball, volleyball, and tennis. Whether you’re a casual player or a sports enthusiast, you’ll enjoy maintaining your active lifestyle here.
communitySlider.05Desc: Meet neighbors, relax with friends, or simply enjoy quiet time at our Community Lounge. Offering a warm atmosphere and a great selection of beverages and snacks, it’s an inviting place to unwind.
communitySlider.06Desc: At KidsNest, your children aged 3-9 are in caring hands. Drop them off with their lunchboxes, and our dedicated staff will engage them in fun, creative, and educational activities until you return. KidsNest ensures your peace of mind and their joyful experience.
communitySlider.07Desc: Dive into immersive gaming at our Game Hub, a modern video arcade featuring the latest PlayStation games. Ideal for individual play or friendly competitions, it’s a vibrant spot for entertainment.

about.title: Zepyur Residential Area
about.desc1: ZEPYUR is a lifestyle that, in addition to comfortable houses, offers numerous amenities for a complete and healthy daily life. In each phase, we create not only residential spaces but also a modern and comfortable environment for the formation of a complete community.
about.desc2: The ZEPYUR residential district is located 21 km from Yerevan, in the picturesque Kotayk region, in the village of Nor Geghi, in the Nor Hachn community. This meticulously planned project covers a spacious 10 hectares of land, offering a combination of style and tranquility.
about.desc3: Residents of the 'Zepyur' residential district will discover that every detail has been thoughtfully designed to enhance the living experience.
about.desc4: With land plots ranging from (200-600) sq.m and residential spaces of (50-100) sq.m, the project in its first phase offers a limited number of 59 houses with a unique architectural identity, combining modern design and elegance.
about.desc5: Residents of the 'ZEPYUR' project will discover that every detail has been thoughtfully developed to improve living conditions. With land plots ranging from (200-600) sq.m and residential areas from (50-150) sq.m, the project (in its first phase) offers a limited number of 59 private houses with a unique architectural identity.

desc.after: Entrepreneur, specializing in business strategy and the development of organizational efficiency. Co-founder of the «Rock Four» retail chain.

Civil Engineer and Project Management Specialist. Has many years of experience in the field of construction project management, specializing in the effective organization of construction and development processes.

Candidate of Sciences, Associate Professor — a specialist with many years of experience in the development and management of construction projects. Author of several significant projects and co-founder of the «Zepyur» residential district.
Architect with extensive experience in designing multi-apartment buildings, private houses, and public structures. Author of several significant projects.

With over two decades of experience in concept development and strategic branding, he leads the creative direction of the project as Brand Manager and Marketing Consultant, shaping «ZEPYUR»’s identity, market positioning, communications, and public reputation across all platforms.

desc.before: Financial planning, budgeting, and overall fiscal oversight
desc.after: Finance Director — Qualified Accountant (ACCA Level 9) with extensive experience in financial management, planning, and cost optimization.

desc.before: Overall supervision of executions and timelines
desc.after: Construction project manager, specialized in effective organization and management of construction processes, with extensive experience in project leadership and supervision.

amentiesSlider.amentiesDesc1: Conveniently located, our Marketplace provides fresh produce, daily essentials, and household goods. Designed for comfort and ease, it ensures your shopping experience is efficient and enjoyable, right at your doorstep.
amentiesSlider.amentiesDesc2: Designed for active residents, the Sports Arena offers outdoor courts for football, basketball, volleyball, and tennis. Whether you’re a casual player or a sports enthusiast, you’ll enjoy maintaining your active lifestyle here.
amentiesSlider.amentiesDesc3: Dive into immersive gaming at our Game Hub, a modern video arcade featuring the latest PlayStation games. Ideal for individual play or friendly competitions, it’s a vibrant spot for entertainment.
amentiesSlider.amentiesDesc4: KidsNest provides a safe and engaging environment for your children aged 3-9. Our trained staff will keep them entertained with fun, creative, and educational activities until you return. KidsNest ensures your peace of mind while your children enjoy their time.
amentiesSlider.amentiesDesc5: Our Wellness Complex promotes a healthy lifestyle with exceptional facilities, including an indoor swimming pool, state-of-the-art gym, and relaxing steam room. It’s your personal sanctuary for fitness and relaxation, year-round.

amenities.title: Our Amenities
amenities.desc1: Residents of ZEPYUR will have access to thoughtfully designed amenities aimed at enhancing lifestyle and providing comfort. These include a supermarket, food court, wellness complex, sports arena, gaming club, and cine lounge.
amenities.blockDesc1: Residents of ZEPYUR will enjoy access to thoughtfully curated amenities designed to enhance lifestyle and provide convenience. The project has a Marketplace, Dining plaza, Events hall, Wellness complex, Sports arena, Community cafe, Cine lounge, Game hub.
amenities.blockDesc2: Full-service supermarket stocked with fresh produce and daily essentials. Diverse food court offering a mix of local and international flavors. Outdoor sports facilities include a universal court for football, basketball, volleyball, and tennis, encouraging active and social lifestyles and others.
amenities.longDesc: At «ZEPYUR» Residential Area, every amenity has been thoughtfully planned to enhance your living experience. Our comprehensive facilities ensure residents can enjoy convenience, recreation, wellness, and leisure — all within their own community.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.desc1: Zepyur is a lifestyle that, in addition to comfortable private houses, offers a variety of amenities to enjoy a full and healthy day. At each stage, we create not just residential spaces, but also a modern and convenient environment to foster a complete community.
gallery.desc2: Residents of Zepyur will benefit from well-thought-out amenities designed to enhance lifestyle and provide maximum comfort.
gallery.desc3: Residents can participate in community-organized events, fostering social connections and strengthening the sense of community.
gallery.desc4: Zepyur offers a variety of activities for both relaxation and physical wellness, supporting a healthy and balanced lifestyle.
gallery.desc5: The media section includes photos and videos that showcase life at Zepyur, the environment, and community-organized events.

contacts.question: Have A Question?
contacts.title1: Leave your contacts and we will contact you

questions.a: ZEPYUR is located just 21km from Yerevan, in Nor Geghi village, Kotayk region. A short drive from the city — and a world away in atmosphere — it offers natural views, clean air, and thoughtful design in every direction.

questions.q: What types of properties are available?
questions.a:
ZEPYUR includes:
107 single-level houses with private yards and two parking spaces
45 two-story townhouses, uniformly designed for modern lifestyles
96 stylish apartments in 1, 2, and 3-bedroom formats
Each residence is part of a unified architectural vision, yet offers layout flexibility for different needs.

ZEPYUR is a self-contained residential area with:
Supermarket, bakery, food court
Indoor swimming pool, gym, steam room
Sports arena (football, basketball, volleyball, tennis)
Events hall, community café
KidsNest daycare, Cine Lounge, Game Hub
Every feature is designed to enhance daily life — all within walking distance.
No. ZEPYUR is not gated, by design. It’s an open, inclusive, master-planned area with smart infrastructure and spatial layout that ensures privacy, safety, and accessibility — without walls.

Yes — ZEPYUR was designed for families. From child daycare and safe play areas to walkable streets and wellness zones, everything supports a balanced lifestyle for parents, children, and even multigenerational households.

First phase (homes): Ready by end of 2026
Full project: Expected completion by end of 2029
Your individual unit can be completed within 3 to 6 months from contract signing and delivered to you for instant usage — there is no need to wait for the full project to finish.

questions.q: How long does it take to build a unit?
questions.a: Once your agreement is signed, your home can be completed in just 3 to 6 months, depending on the property type and size. Multiple units are constructed simultaneously with professional supervision.

questions.q: Do I need to wait for the entire project to end before I can use my home?
questions.a: No. You can move in and begin using your home as soon as it is built and officially delivered to you — regardless of whether the rest of the project is still under construction.

questions.q: Who is behind the ZEPYUR project?
questions.a: ZEPYUR is developed by Housing Club LLC. Construction is led by AVETISYAN Estate, and the full sales process is managed by EXACT Management — a trusted name in real estate marketing and customer experience.

questions.q: What type of ownership does ZEPYUR offer?
questions.a: All ZEPYUR properties are sold as full private ownership under a single agreement. No shared or partial ownership models are offered — your name, your property.

questions.q: Are payment plans or bank financing accepted?
questions.a:
Yes. ZEPYUR accepts multiple financial arrangements, including:
Bank mortgage financing
Staged payment contracts
Customized payment solutions based on buyer needs
Our team will guide you through available options during your reservation process.

questions.q: Can I reserve a unit online?
questions.a: Yes. Online reservations are available and will hold your selected unit for 3 working days. During that time, you're invited to visit the sales office, finalize terms, and sign your agreement.

HousingClub.name: HOUSING CLUB
HousingClub.desc: Housing Club LLC is the developer of the Zepyur residential community and will manage the service infrastructure within the community.

AmeriaBank.name: AMERIA BANK
AmeriaBank.desc: A leading Armenian financial institution known for innovation, customer-centric digital services, and a strong presence in the banking sector.

Exact.name: EXACT
Exact.desc: A reliable partner in construction project management — from planning to completion. A professional team ensuring quality and on-time delivery of construction projects. Project management that is efficient, precise, and risk-free.

EvocaBank.name: EVOCA BANK
EvocaBank.desc: A modern, tech-first Armenian bank reshaping personal finance with intuitive apps, smart banking tools, and a youthful approach to digital customer service.

Avetisyan.name: AVETISYAN HOLDING
Avetisyan.desc: A construction company that, with many years of experience and a team of skilled professionals, has successfully implemented projects of various types and complexities. It is specialized particularly in the construction of civil buildings and structures, ensuring quality and reliability.

AcbaBank.name: ACBA BANK
AcbaBank.desc: A trusted Armenian bank rooted in cooperative values, offering comprehensive services to individuals, SMEs, and rural sectors with a focus on community growth.

NoshN.name: NOSHN
NoshN.desc: An international brand and concept firm specializing in full-spectrum business strategy, identity, marketing, and creative direction — from idea to execution.

Betton.name: BETTON
Betton.desc: An architectural company with extensive experience and having completed many different projects, specializing in an integrated approach to projects of various types of buildings (residential, public, industrial) - from idea to implementation.
